sen.j: 神楽笛（かぐらぶえ）とは、雅楽で使う管楽器の1つ。
sen.e: Kagurabue flute is a wind instrument used in the performance of gagaku (ancient Japanese court music).
Kagurabue flute is a wind instrument used in the performance of gagaku (ancient Japanese court music).
Kagurabue flute is a wind instrument used in the performance of gagaku (ancient Japanese court music).
It counts among Fukimono (wind instruments of the court music of Japan).
It is counted among Fukimono (wind instruments of the court music of Japan).
It is counted among Fukimono (wind instruments of the court music of Japan).

sen.j: 国風歌舞と、一部の近代に作られた神楽で使われる。
sen.e: This instrument is used in Kuniburi-no-utamai (music and dance performance in Japan from ancient times) and some kagura performances (sacred music and dancing performed at shrines) made in the modern times.

This instrument is used in Kuniburi-no-utamai (music and dance performance in Japan from ancient times) and some kagura performances (sacred music and dancing performed at shrines) made in modern times.

This instrument is used in kuniburi no utamai (Japanese traditional dance executed in the ceremonies of the court) and some kagura performances (sacred music and dancing performed at shrines) made in modern times.

sen.j: 神楽笛は竹の管で作られ、表側に6つの孔(あな)を持つ横笛である。
sen.e: Kagurabue flute is a transverse flute made of a bamboo tube with six holes on the front.
Kagurabue flute is a transverse flute made of a bamboo tube with six holes on the front.
Kagurabue flute is a transverse flute made of a bamboo tube with six holes on the front.

sen.j: 西洋楽器のフルートに似ている。
sen.e: Its appearance is similar to flute, a Western music instrument.
Its appearance is similar to flute, a Western musical instrument.
Its appearance is similar to flute, a Western musical instrument.

sen.j: 音の高さは龍笛より一音低い。
sen.e: The pitch of Kagurabue flute is a whole step lower than that of Ryuteki flute.
The pitch of Kagurabue flute is a whole step lower than that of Ryuteki flute.
The pitch of Kagurabue flute is a whole step lower than that of Ryuteki flute.
Kagurabue flute has a range (the distance from the lowest to the highest pitch it can play) of D5 to C7.
Kagurabue flute has a range (the distance from the lowest to the highest pitch it can play) of D5 to C7.
Kagurabue flute has a range (the distance from the lowest to the highest pitch it can play) of D5 to C7.
